body:
Ok I manage to produce DLA analysis. But I still have a question.

In the definition of DLA ([http://patternguide.advancedbuildings.net/using-this-guide/analysis...](http://patternguide.advancedbuildings.net/using-this-guide/analysis-methods/daylight-autonomy)) As well as in The daylight handbook I [http://thedaylightsite.com/daylighting-handbook-i/](http://thedaylightsite.com/daylighting-handbook-i/)) which I recommend to everyone interested in daylight metrics. The definition always talks about 50% of the occupancy period. In HB the component only returns the DLA as a % of the Occ. Period.

Is the 50% of Occ.Period required or DLA can also work as given by the HB component?

 

thank you all
